ISSUE.TITLE: core/cap issues
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Sorry for all the issues being reported. This one's two parts When fetching cap or core info for a single part (example: https://api.spacexdata.com/v1/parts/cores/B1036) it shouldn't return an array, just a single object Also, the wiki entry for cap endpoints is incorrect. It lists the url as https://api.spacexdata.com/v1/parts/caps/C106/ when it should be https://api.spacexdata.com/v1/parts/caps/C106 as the first url produces an error

COMMIT.MESSAGE: return single object when fetching cap/core by serial fixed issue #36
Merge pull request #37 from waterskier2007/master fixed issue #36
